title: Higher Education Staff Data
description: A wide range of tables and charts about staff employed in higher education.
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified via a links towards bottom of page under table column heading "table/chart".  Once relevant table link clicked, a data table is presented on anew page, at the bottom of this table is a link to the actual data in CSV form titled "Download table (csv) | Download source data (csv)".
sizingNotes:
As far as I can see relevant tables for disabilities seem to be; Table 5: HE academic staff by disability and academic employment function 2014/15 to 2017/18" and when "next" clicked to reveal further tables, Table 20: HE full-time academic staff by HE provider and contract salary 2014/15 to 2017/18 and
Table 16: HE full-time academic staff by cost centre and contract salary 2014/15 to 2017/18. Simple table structure and dimensions. CSV format downloadable.
notes:
Open Data source available, so this is potentially an easy win dataset.
May fit better with an "Education" family
